Message:
F-Father...?
Even the maids...
Their faces were pale,
like lifeless dolls...

What...is this?
What’s going on?!
“Well, what’d you expect?

Just like you wished,
they’re now puppets
who’ll obey your every word.”

“No, this isn’t what I wanted!
Change them back!”

But at that moment,
smoke began to fill the room.

Peering out the window,
I saw the castle was ablaze...

“Don’t lose hope.
There’s still a way out of this.

If you command yourself
to save everyone,
you’ll be able to harness
power beyond your limits.”
“Just how far are you...?!”

Everything finally
clicked in my head.
This was a demon.

A venomous demon who
twists the hearts of people
with sweet temptations.

“Hehe. Suit yourself,
but if you don’t get a move on,
they’re all going to die.”

Why...? Why do the humans,
and now, even demons,
keep coming after us...?

Why do they keep trying
to take everything from us?!

No one’s going
to save us... So...

I’ll have to protect
everyone myself.
I won’t let anyone take
a single thing from us,
ever again...

Don’t think things’ll keep
going your way anymore.

Fate, demons...
nothing will stop me!

“Listen up, me.
I need you to become
the strongest—
stronger than
anyone out there!!”

The sigil from my contract
began to glow, and then...
